choose.when:
select * from tbl_board where del_or_not = 1
and title like CONCAT('%',#{searchWord},'%')
and content like CONCAT('%',#{searchWord},'%')
and writer like CONCAT('%',#{searchWord},'%')
order by b_idx desc limit #{startIdx}, 10

insert into tb_product (m_idx, category, product_name, product_code, brand, summary, detail,start_date,end_date,p_origin_file_name1,p_save_file_name1,price,sales_unit,p_reg_date,p_last_modified_date) values(#{m_idx},#{category}, #{product_name}, #{product_code}, #{brand}, #{summary}, #{detail},#{start_date},#{end_date},#{p_origin_file_name1},#{p_save_file_name1},#{price},#{sales_unit},#{p_reg_date},#{p_last_modified_date})
